mapper.select:
SELECT RIBR.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , RIBR.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , RIBR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , RIBR.ERR_CN , CCB.CST_KNM , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE PD_CD = SCD.BASE_PD_CD) AS PD_NM , SCB.CNTR_CNFM_DTM , RIBR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD
, RIBR.DG_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , SCSB.MPY_MTHD_TP_CD , RIBB.DG_CNTR_SN , SCSB.BNK_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , CCB.BRYY_MMDD
, RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AS SDING_CNTR_SN , SCSB.MPY_MTHD_TP_CD AS SDING_MPY_MTHD_TP_CD , RIBB.DG_CNTR_SN AS SDING_DG_CNTR_SN , SCSB.BNK_CD AS SDING_BNK_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR AS SDING_ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.OWR_KNM AS SDING_OWR_KNM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT AS SDING_MPY_BSDT , CCB.BRYY_MMDD AS SDING_BRYY_MMDD FROM TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_ERR_IZ RIBR RIGHT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON RIBR.DG_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND RIBR.DG_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO RIGHT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON CCB.CST_NO = SCB.CNTR_CST_NO /* AND COPN_DV_CD 법인격구분코드 추후에 수정*/ RIGHT OUTER JOIN TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_BAS RIBB ON RIBR.DG_CNTR_NO = RIBB.SUBOD_CNTR_NO AND RIBR.DG_CNTR_SN = RIBB.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AND RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = RIBB.SUBOD_CNTR_NO AND RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = RIBB.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AND RIBB.DG_YN = 'Y' AND RIBB.FNT_DV_CD IN ('01','02') RIGHT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON RIBR.DG_CNTR_NO = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO AND RIBR.DG_CNTR_SN = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN AND RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO AND RIBR.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB ON SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND RIBR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND RIBR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD = '00'
AND RIBR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD = '01'
AND RIBR.DG_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND RIBR.DG_CNTR_SN = ${cntrSn} AND RIBR.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM BETWEEN #{cntrPdStrtdt} AND #{cntrPdEnddt}
